caption.p:
Effects of L. regularis (Lr) on diabetic-induced changes in hepatic proinflammatory cytokines including tumor necrosis factor- α (TNF- α), interleukin-1 β (IL-1 β), and interleukin-6 (IL-6) levels. Data were expressed as mean ± SEM ( n = 6) and analyzed using one-way ANOVA followed by Student–Newman–Keuls as a post hoc test.
∗ Control vs STZ group; #STZ vs Lr (150) or Lr (300). P values are considered significant when
∗ or # P < 0.05,
∗∗ or ## P < 0.01, and
∗∗∗ or ### P < 0.001.
